p: In 2017, 123,087 autochthonous cases were confirmed in the American continent ( Pan American Health Organization, 2020). In Brazil, unprecedented dissemination of CHIKV infections has been occurring since 2015, with an accumulated of 712,990 confirmed cases notified over a 4-year period. This outbreak had its major incidence in the Southeast and Northeast regions of the Brazilian territory, corresponding to two-thirds of all confirmed Brazilian cases mainly in periurban and highly populated urban areas of the country.
